lessons.title: Cryptoeconomics
info: In this lesson, we will take a look at
what is this often misunderstood topic called cryptoeconomics!

lessons.title: Cryptoeconomic Primitives
info: We will talk more about cryptoeconomics
with focus on Curation and Prediction markets and Stable Coins.

lessons.title: Ethereum overview
info: Ethereum is a decentralized platform designed to run smart contracts.
In this lesson I will walk you through the differences between bitcoin and ethereum
and I will try to create a nice overview of the Ethereum ecosystem.

lessons.title: Intro to Solidity
info: Solidity is an object-oriented, high-level language for implementing smart contracts.
It was influenced by C++, Python and JavaScript and is designed to target the Ethereum Virtual Machine.
Let us take a look how it works and let us try it out in the editor on your right side.

lessons.title: Smart contracts, storage, oracles
info: We will take a look at how to store data in a decentralized ecosystem
and how to access the context from the outside world to the smart contracts.

lessons.title: Dapp overview and use cases
info: We will learn about what are Dapps (decentralized apps), how are they built
and then we will also take a look at some examples.
